name: Remitly Global, Inc.
description: Remitly Global, Inc. is a leading digital remittance service provider that facilitates international money transfers for immigrants and their families. Founded in 2011 by Matt Oppenheimer, Josh Hug, and Dax Dasilva, Remitly's mission is to provide a trusted, affordable, and convenient way for people to send money across borders. The company’s platform allows users to send money to over 100 countries, with various delivery options including bank deposits, cash pickups, mobile top-ups, and airtime refills. Remitly emphasizes transparency, speed, and customer service, aiming to reduce the costs associated with traditional money transfer services. The company has developed a user-friendly mobile application that makes it easy for customers to send money anytime, anywhere. With a strong commitment to financial inclusion, Remitly is also focused on providing financial education and resources to underserved communities, helping them manage their finances better. As the demand for digital financial services continues to grow, Remitly is well-positioned to capitalize on this trend and expand its services globally.
